title: Additional Resources
description: A help sub-menu with custom links

menu-title.title: Title of the Help sub-Menu
menu-title.description: This is the name of the Help sub-Menu that is displayed to users

open-in-jupyter.title: Open links in Jupyter tabs
open-in-jupyter.description: Should links be opened in a Jupyter tab or a browser tab

rank.title: Ranking
rank.description:
Placement ranking in the help menu. 
Increasing this value will lower the placement, and decreasing will raise it. 
A value of 10 will place this submenu at the bottom of the Help menu, -1 will place it at the top.

links.title: Help Menu links
